prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
+91 73387 43384 | aravindan.t1983@gmail.com
ARAVINDAN T
SUMMARY
Over 14 years of experience in the Design, Modeling, Development, Implementation and Support of SQL Server 2000/2005/2008/2012
Expert in analyzing, designing, developing and deploying MS SQL Server suite of products with Business Intelligence in SQL Server Reporting Services 2005/2008 and SQL Server Integration Services.
Expertise in writing T-SQL Queries, Dynamic-queries, sub-queries and complex joins for generating Complex Stored Procedures, Triggers, User-defined Functions, Views and Cursors.
Experience in using SSIS tools like Import and Export Wizard, Package Installation, and SSIS Package Designer.
Experience in importing/exporting data between different sources like Flat Files/Access/Excel etc. using SSIS/DTS utility.
Experience in ETL processes involving migrations and in sync processes between two databases.
Expertise in using global variables, expressions and functions for the reports with immense experience in handling sub reports in Crystal Reports.
Expertise in Membership software(Association management system) 
Worked as Solutions Architect for mobile applications for 18 months. Provided complete end-to-end solutions for different modules of the application.
Ability to handle multiple tasks, Initiative and Adaptable. Self-motivated, organized team player with strong problem solving and analytical skills and total commitment to the organization goals.
Good ability to quickly grasp and master new concepts and technologies
Have basic understanding of US Health care industry.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Excelencia Consulting [May 2022 - June 2024]
Aspire Systems [April 2022-Aug 2022]
Savvy Soft Technologies  [June 2018 to Apr 2020]
	Senior Database Engineer 				June 2018 - Apr 2019
Rheinbrucke IT consulting [June 2016 to Feb 2018]
	Senior Lead						Jun 2016 – Feb 2018
IBM India pvt ltd [October 2015 to June 2016]
	Sr. Application Developer (Contract) 			Oct 2015 – Jun 2016
AMS TECHNOLOGIES [April
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
